about_the_game:
This is a ROGUE game set in a different world.

Gameplay:
This is a vampire survival game where you can choose 1 hero and combine them with 4 monsters to form different teams for the game.
By meeting certain hidden conditions, heroes can awaken and gain stronger powers.
Once in the game, you need to kill monsters quickly to gain experience and level up.
After leveling up, you can choose 1 out of 4 skills to allocate to your hero or monster.
The effectiveness of the skills depends on the attributes of your hero or monster.
The longer you survive and the higher you climb, the stronger the monsters become.

Your game objective:
Climb the Tower of the Dragon as high as possible. The higher the climb, the more dangerous it becomes, but the rewards and your longevity increase.

Game Features:

You can choose 1 hero and 4 dragons to form a team, combining them with various randomly generated skills in the game.
Heroes can awaken.
Skills in the game are automatically released, making it more casual.
The difficulty increases as you go up and decreases as you go down, allowing for adjustable pace.
The game offers a wide variety of items and skills.
Upgrading won't interrupt the game; you can press E to use all skill points at once.
